00035 class btConstraintSolverPoolMt : public btConstraintSolver
00036 {
00037 public:
00038     // create the solvers for me
00039     explicit btConstraintSolverPoolMt( int numSolvers );
00040 
00041     // pass in fully constructed solvers (destructor will delete them)
00042     btConstraintSolverPoolMt( btConstraintSolver** solvers, int numSolvers );
00043 
00044     virtual ~btConstraintSolverPoolMt();
00045 
00047     virtual btScalar solveGroup( btCollisionObject** bodies,
00048         int numBodies,
00049         btPersistentManifold** manifolds,
00050         int numManifolds,
00051         btTypedConstraint** constraints,
00052         int numConstraints,
00053         const btContactSolverInfo& info,
00054         btIDebugDraw* debugDrawer,
00055         btDispatcher* dispatcher
00056     ) BT_OVERRIDE;
00057 
00058     virtual     void reset() BT_OVERRIDE;
00059     virtual btConstraintSolverType getSolverType() const BT_OVERRIDE { return m_solverType; }
00060 
00061 private:
00062     const static size_t kCacheLineSize = 128;
00063     struct ThreadSolver
00064     {
00065         btConstraintSolver* solver;
00066         btSpinMutex mutex;
00067         char _cachelinePadding[ kCacheLineSize - sizeof( btSpinMutex ) - sizeof( void* ) ];  // keep mutexes from sharing a cache line
00068     };
00069     btAlignedObjectArray<ThreadSolver> m_solvers;
00070     btConstraintSolverType m_solverType;
00071 
00072     ThreadSolver* getAndLockThreadSolver();
00073     void init( btConstraintSolver** solvers, int numSolvers );
00074 };

00097     struct UpdaterCreatePredictiveContacts : public btIParallelForBody
00098     {
00099         btScalar timeStep;
00100         btRigidBody** rigidBodies;
00101         btDiscreteDynamicsWorldMt* world;
00102 
00103         void forLoop( int iBegin, int iEnd ) const BT_OVERRIDE
00104         {
00105             world->createPredictiveContactsInternal( &rigidBodies[ iBegin ], iEnd - iBegin, timeStep );
00106         }
00107     };
00108     virtual void createPredictiveContacts( btScalar timeStep ) BT_OVERRIDE;
00109 
00110     struct UpdaterIntegrateTransforms : public btIParallelForBody
00111     {
00112         btScalar timeStep;
00113         btRigidBody** rigidBodies;
00114         btDiscreteDynamicsWorldMt* world;
00115 
00116         void forLoop( int iBegin, int iEnd ) const BT_OVERRIDE
00117         {
00118             world->integrateTransformsInternal( &rigidBodies[ iBegin ], iEnd - iBegin, timeStep );
00119         }
00120     };
00121     virtual void integrateTransforms( btScalar timeStep ) BT_OVERRIDE;
00122

00124         BT_DECLARE_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR();

00127         btBroadphaseInterface* pairCache,

00129         btCollisionConfiguration* collisionConfiguration
00130     );
